message: I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think I can do a little better. How about a 60/40 split?
I'm willing to split the difference, Bob. Let's go with 60/40 this time.
Okay Alice, you drive a hard bargain! I'm willing to meet you in the middle - 55/45?
I think 55/45 is a fair compromise, Bob.  Let's get this done!
